theorem norm_le_norm_one (φ : character_space 𝕜 A) :
    «expr‖ ‖» (to_normed_dual (φ : weak_dual 𝕜 A)) ≤ «expr‖ ‖» (1 : A) :=
  continuous_linear_map.op_norm_le_bound _ (norm_nonneg (1 : A)) fun a =>
    mul_comm («expr‖ ‖» a) («expr‖ ‖» (1 : A)) ▸ spectrum.norm_le_norm_mul_of_mem (apply_mem_spectrum φ a)
#align norm_le_norm_one norm_le_norm_one
